Provo.Stewart\u2013Hills House:
The Stewart–Hills House is a historic house located at 275 East 2000 South in Orem, Utah was built in 1915.


== Description and history ==
The 1-1/2 story house was constructed in about 1915, and was designed in the Bungalow/craftsman style.
It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2004.
